text:
any one know how we can use value of custom module field to other module within same template

i found this but dont know how to use it
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context#retrieving-parameters-from-modules-already-rendered-on-the-template>

i am trying to use test_module filed in blog content with this code but itâ€™s not working, any one has any idea ??

```{{ content.widgets.test_module.test }}```

Hi there! we are using Martech default template for our blog, but for some reason I cannot add a menu to the header. Could anybody help me out? I have tried everything that occurred to me. The template cannot be edited in Design Tools because it is from HubSpot apparently
clone the template.  you should be able to edit it then
How to clone a default template? it does not appear in the Design Tools

Hey Francisco, you would have to use the CLI to pull down the theme, then, you could make adjustments and upload the copy to another directory in your portal.

See here for reference:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/themes/default-themes>
If you edit a post, you should be able to access the global content editor to set the menu you wish to apply to the template.
Thank you all! I will try to use CLI and pull that out :slightly_smiling_face:
